text: Convert this binary floating-point number into denary. LA O N N R 1ol 5 1 35 |6l lalis —128 | 64|32 | 16 41211 lof [efolufrfofri]of[ o JoJofofofi]ofo] Solution Method 1 Add up the mantissa values where a 1bit appears: 11 1 1 _32 8 4 1 45 M=—+4—+—F—="—F—+—+—=— 2 8 16 64 64 64 64 64 64 Add up the exponent values where a 1bit appears: E=4 Use M X 2E: B x2t=Bx16 64 64 =0.703125x16
